name: Young Dryad
flavor: An imperious tree-person leading their forest’s defenses.

features.name: Voice of the Forest - Action
features.desc: Mark a Stress to spotlight 1d4 allies within range of a target they can attack without moving. On a success, their attacks deal half damage.

features.name: Thorny Cage - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to form a cage around a target within Very Close range and Restrain them until they’re freed with a successful Strength Roll. When a creature makes an action roll against the cage, they must mark a Stress.

features.name: Momentum - Reaction
features.desc: When the Dryad makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.
